pages.text: $(bgreen)Angel Starfruit$() despises starfruit from a small village, she thought starfruit is too lazy and no pursuit.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)225$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)5 stars in 5 directions$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy. It has chance to $(bred)shoot 5 more stars$() each attack.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several stars each tick$() in 5 directions which last several seconds.
